speaker: Common Room
lines: You find a seat as benches creak around you.
Stew moves from pot to tables in steady rounds.
Cards slap the wood; dice rattle in a cup.
A gray cat naps by the hearth with one eye open.
A scarred patron listens and watches.
Someone argues about a ghost in town.
The alley door sticks when damp.

choices.text: Drop a coin for the bard and listen.
Slip into the alley for air.
